document.full_text: former gov. rod r. blagojevich told jurors tuesday that he was not interested in taking campaign donations in exchange for president obama's vacated united states senate seat.
document.title: midwest: illinois: blagojevich denies a deal
lines_and_colors: former gov. rod r. blagojevich told jurors tuesday that he was not interested in taking campaign donations in exchange for president obama's vacated united states senate seat.
